channel.title: Wanting to edit a .class file for client (not working)
channel.description: Hey guys, Im using demonik source atm and was trying to change the name of the actual client itself I know that some it has to do with mudclient$1.class and version.class, i have gotten version.class compiled using javac but i dont see any change in the client itself. Im really confused and dont know where to start. How do i change the website displayed on the loading screen? how do i change the name of the client window? I have been trying for so long but just cant get a grasp on it. Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Wanting to edit a .class file for client (not working)
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Umm, you edit .java then compile them to .class files.

Depending on the source you are using, the client name can be changed through mudclient.JAVA or version.JAVA

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to edit a .class file for client (not working)

item.title: Wanting to edit a .class file for client (not working)
item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

your trying it backwards, but you can edit it this way using bytecode
try editing the java files for the classes, mudclient.java is mudclient.class, and version.java is version.class
after you edit the java files then compile it, and you should see a change

Read full topic
